title: Missing Ahri Foxfire Skin sale

embed.description: Check out all the champs and skins that'll be on sale this July. Like previous sales schedules, we're not posting the exact dates for each champ and skin, but they'll all be on sale sometime next month, so keep an eye out.

body: This month's posted skin sale included The Ahri Foxfire skin but to my disappointment the last 3 days of the skin sale have come out and there is still no Foxfire skin. Have a missed something? please correct me if I'm wrong. thanks.

replies.body:
Thanks for the reply, I did not realize there is another sale spot for this month. 

I am now happy again.

I've also been hanging out for that skin, maybe they will make it available in the next few days...

Here's hoping anyway.
